duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support to customers in a complex environment.
Address billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and provide support for the company's website and mobile app.
Deliver efficient problem resolution using technology and learning resources.
Proactively share knowledge to reduce customer effort.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve intermediate policy and account-related questions from internal and external customers.
Stay current with relevant products and strive to support the organization’s overall strategy.
Model the company's core values and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Four-year college degree preferred)
